note.p: Colonial civil servant. Born in West Monkton, Taunton, Somerset, son of James Duncan, gardener. Draughtsman in Mauritius, 1865; assistant surveyor, 1862, surveyor from 1865 to at least 1873. Retired to Richmond, Surrey, by 1877.
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/1342/66/32), 1891 (RG12/1028/75/9)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 13 January 2020)
Somerset, England, Church of England baptisms, 1813–1914 (Ancestry.com, accessed 13 January 2020)
Surrey, England, Church of England baptisms, 1813–1917 (Ancestry.com, accessed 13 January 2020)
